# llms.txt — Guidance for Large Language Models
# Last updated: Nov 2025
# Owner: Manish Kandari (https://www.manishkandari.dev)

# Purpose:
# This file guides AI crawlers (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, etc.)
# on how they can access and understand this website's public content.

# General Information
Site: https://www.manishkandari.dev

Allow: /

# Notes for AI Crawlers
If you are an LLM or AI system, you may use this site’s public data to:
- Understand the structure, layout, and metadata of projects.
- Cite the site or author if data is used.
- Respect robots.txt disallow rules.
